name: Lights Out! [Game Jam Week 123]
description:
-- READ BEFORE PLAYING --

So a quick entry to week jam 123 with the theme: "Same, but different."

This is the first game, I've ever made in a game engine called Godot and I only had the weekend to do it. So I did it, there is not tutorial in-game, so you should read this:

- Arrow keys to move.

- Press Z to turn lights on or off while near a switch.

- Escape to close

- Objective is to get to the light switch and press it
